logs.description: The logs, indexed by display name.

defined_tags.description: Map of key-value pairs of defined tags. (Optional)

freeform_tags.description: Map of key-value pairs of freeform tags. (Optional)

logs.description: The logs, indexed by display name.

defined_tags.description: Map of key-value pairs of defined tags. (Optional)

freeform_tags.description: Map of key-value pairs of freeform tags. (Optional)

enable_output.description: Whether Terraform should enable the module output.

events_configuration.description: Events configuration settings, defining all aspects to manage events in OCI. Please see the comments within each attribute for details.

enable_output.description: Whether Terraform should enable the module output.

events_configuration.description: Events configuration settings, defining all aspects to manage events in OCI. Please see the comments within each attribute for details.

description.constant_value: CIS Landing Zone Service Connector bucket log group.

activate.description: Whether the Service Connector should be activated.

audit_logs_sources.description: Service Connector select audit logs sources. Use this to pass a select list of audit logs sources. For collecting audit logs tenancy wide, just set enable_tenancy_audit_logs_sources to true.

cis_level.description: The CIS OCI Benchmark profile level for buckets. Level 1 is be practical and prudent. Level 2 is intended for environments where security is more critical than manageability and usability.

compartment_id.description: The compartment ocid where to create the Service Connector.

enable_tenancy_audit_logs_sources.description: Whether audit logs sources should be enabled tenancy wide.

non_audit_logs_sources.description: The Service Connector logs sources other than audit log sources.

policy_defined_tags.description: The Service Connector policy defined tags.

policy_freeform_tags.description: The Service Connector policy freeform tags.

target_bucket_kms_key_id.description: The KMS key ocid used to encrypt the target Object Storage bucket.

target_bucket_name.description: The target Object Storage bucket name to be created.

target_bucket_namespace.description: The target Object Storage bucket namespace. If null, the module retrives the namespace based on the tenancy ocid.

target_defined_tags.description: The Service Connector target defined tags.

target_freeform_tags.description: The Service Connector target freeform tags.

target_log_group_id.description: The target log group ocid. Used when target_kind = logginganalytics.

target_object_name_prefix.description: The target Object Storage object name prefix.

target_object_store_batch_rollover_size_.description: The batch rollover size in megabytes.

target_object_store_batch_rollover_time_.description: The batch rollover time in milliseconds.

target_policy_name.description: The Service Connector target policy name.

target_stream_id.description: The target stream name or ocid. If a name is given, a new stream is created. If an ocid is given, the existing stream is used.

target_stream_partitions.description: The number of partitions in the target stream. Applicable if target_stream is not an ocid.

target_stream_retention_in_hours.description: The retention period of the target stream, in hours. Applicable if target_stream is not an ocid.

enable_output.description: Whether Terraform should enable module output.

streams_configuration.description: Streams configuration settings, defining all aspects to manage streams in OCI. Please see the comments within each attribute for details.

activate_service_connector.description: Whether Service Connector Hub should be activated. If true, costs my incur due to usage of Object Storage bucket, Streaming or Function.

buckets_log_group_name.description: The log group name for all bucket logs being enabled.

cis_level.description: Determines CIS OCI Benchmark Level to apply on Landing Zone managed resources. Level 1 is be practical and prudent. Level 2 is intended for environments where security is more critical than manageability and usability. Level 2 drives the creation of write logs for buckets, per CIS Benchmark for OCI.

cloud_guard_risk_level_threshold.description: Determines the minimum Risk level that triggers the sending of Cloud Guard events. E.g. a setting of High will send notifications for Critical and High problems.

enable_flow_logs_for_subnets_in_these_cm.description: The subnets compartments OCIDs to enable flow logs for.

enable_logs_for_buckets_in_these_cmps.description: The buckets compartments OCIDs to enable logs for.

flow_logs_group_name.description: Log group name for all flow logs being enabled.

ingest_existing_bucket_logs_in_these_cmp.description: The compartments OCIDs where to search for existing bucket logs.

ingest_existing_flow_logs_in_these_cmps.description: The compartments OCIDs where to search for existing flow logs.

private_key_path.description: Local path to user private key.

security_compartment_id.description: The security compartment OCID, where logs, stream and service connector are provisioned.

service_connector_policy_name.description: Service Connector policy name. A policy is created for allowing the managed service connector to push data to the target resource.
